modName: Tactics Ogre Companions with Epic Battles
summary:
This mod adds 20+ companions from the game series Tactic\'s Ogre and some from Ogre Battle. It also adds several Epic Battles with difficult groups of foes.

This mod has been re-released, with new updates.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 20+ Companions from Tactic\'s Ogre and Ogre Battle. Two of my favorite games from childhood, and a cast of characters that many RPG gamers loved.

I have re-released this mod as some people have requested for me to revive it. It has been updated with new perks for companions and aesthetics (hair).
-Added a red-hair color mod for the redheads (This cast was very redhead heavy)
-Deneb as requested is now a redhead and not a blonde (with new hair she now looks much nicer).
-Lightfoot perk for all companions (hopefully I never missed anyone).
-A few new hairstyles for some companions.

Working on:
-Adding more Ogre Battle companions.
________________________________________________________________________________________

WARNING:
*The style of characters/faces that I enjoy is certainly not the same preference as everyone, you must decide what types of face mods you want to use.

*Any derogatory/abusive or \"out of line\" comments will be reported. Please be constructive in comments.

*I am open to suggestions/requests for new characters to be added... ask and you shall receive as I am always open to new character ideas.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Now you can have the Xenobian Knights join you in your journey, or simply enlist the aid of willing recruits that are young and stout of heart.

You may only want to enlist the aid of the ferocious and sexy Wicce Deneb.

Recruit them all or just a few it is completely up to you.

________________________________________________________________________________________

EPIC BATTLES: (These battles are not meant for low level characters, and may require an army)
Recommended level 30 (Dragon battle can be done with a group of lvl 20 characters)

Not only do you have the opportunity to let the heroes join you, but you can also help them in defeating their enemies in the realm of Skyrim.

1. Defeat Lans Tartare and his villainous allies as they come ashore near the lighthouse north of Solitude.

2. The beautiful angel Yushis has fallen from the heavens, sent on a mission to track down her rebellious sister who has betrayed the heavens to aid her evil master and lover; Rashidi. The angel has tracked them down to a place of ancient power not far from Helgen.

3. A clan of ancient dragons has been reborn in the valley east of Rorikstead. Witnesses claim to have seen multiple dragons in the area. It is rumored that a group of knights with a beautiful sorceress seek to slay these vicious beasts. (You can see this battle in my video section)

4. The evil necromancer Nybeth and his allies seek to learn the secrets of Labyrinthia. Stop him before he gains entrance to the secrets within.

5. The priestess Oelias and her cursed brother need assistance in the ruins of Aftland.

6. Assist the heroes of yore Destin and Aisha, as they track down an evil foe. Diablo has been reborn with the aid of the witch Endora. Go to Windhelm (Temple of Talos) to find these heroes and aid them in stopping this foe.

________________________________________________________________________________________

COMPANIONS:

All set to Essential
All Marriageable
All have perk Lightfoot (Will not set off traps)
Local Dismissing

Denam - Breton - Spellsword (Destruction/Blades) - Rorikstead
Vyce - Imperial - Assassin (Blades/Stealth) - Rorikstead
Katiua - Breton - Princess (Destruction/Restoration/Conjur/Illusion/Blades) - Rorikstead
Lans - Nord - Knight (Blades/Greatswords/Restoration) - Valley west of Rorikstead
Gildas - Nord - Knight (Greatswords/Battleaxe/Restoration) - Valley west of Rorikstead
Mirdyn - Nord - Knight (Blades/Restoration) - Valley west of Rorikstead
Warren - Breton - Necro Mage (Restoration/Conjuration/Alteration) - Valley west of Rorikstead
Canopus - Wood Elf - Barbarian (Warhammer/Stealth) - Valley west of Rorikstead
Deneb - Breton - Wicce (Destruction/Conjuration/Alteration/Restoration/Illusion) Valley Rorikstead
Arycelle - Nord - Ranger (Archery/Stealth) - Windhelm Palace
Cressida - Breton - Necro Mage (Conjuration/Restoration/Alteration) - Morthal
Jeunan - Imperial - 2-Handed Warrior (Greatswords/Warhammer) - Dawnstar
Ocionne - Imperial - Ranger (Blades/Archery/Stealth) - Dawnstar
Olyvia - Imperial - Monk (Restoration/Alteration) - Markarth Dibella
Cistina - Imperial - Valkyrie (Blades/Greatswords/Restoration/Destruction) - Markarth Dibella
Cerya - Imperial - Rogue (Blades/Archery) - Markarth Dibella
Sherri - Imperial - Destruction Mage (Destruction/Alteration) - Solitude Palace
Folcurt - Imperial - Knight (Blades/Axes/Restoration) - Markarth
Ozma - Nord - 2-Handed Warrior (Greatswords) - Solitude Palace
Iuria - Wood Elf - Bard (Archery/Illusion/Alteration) - Labyrinthia
Destin - Nord - Knight (Greatswords/Restoration) - Windhelm Temple
Aisha - Breton - Monk (Restoration/Alteration) - Windhelm Temple
Osiris - Dark Elf Vampire - Necro Mage (Conjuration/Alteration) - Morthal
Isis - Dark Elf Ghost - Destruction Mage (Ice Destruction/Restoration) - Morthal
Xapan - Nord - Barbarian (Greatswords/Warhammer/Battleaxe) - Lighthouse
Oelias - Breton - Vigilant (Restoration/Alteration) - Aftland Ruins
Dievold - Breton - 2-Handed Warrior (Greatswords/Battleaxe/Warhammer) - Aftland Ruins
Haborym - Imperial - Blade (Blades/Stealth) - Dragon Bridge Tavern
Ravness - Imperial - Knight (Blades/Restoration) - Dragonreach
Yushis - Nord - Angel Knight (Blades/Destruction/Restoration) - Cavern near Helgen
Diego - Nord - Rogue (Blades/Dual/Archery) - Solitude


________________________________________________________________________________________

Required Mods:

Apachiskyhair 1.5 by Apachi - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
ApachiFemales by Apachi, 1.2 and 1.3
ApachiMales by Apachi
More Hair Colors (I have both files active) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27755
Additional NPC Follower Voices - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16266

________________________________________________________________________________________

Recommended Mods (But not required):

UFO - Ultimate follower overhaul. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037 
TERA Armors - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846

Fine Face Textures by urshi - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815
Eyes of Beauty - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
Better Facegen - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953
Better Males http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488 
Better Females http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812 
Body mods (Calientes) 
One of the sexy armor mods out there. (Skimpy) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654
SageOutfit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10710 and/or http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9387 
Cloaks http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092 
Housecarls by Netherwalk - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22155

________________________________________________________________________________________

Installation:

You can use the mod manager for installation.

For a manual install, simply copy/paste/merge the texture/mesh folders as well as the .esp file into your skyrim data folder.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Troubleshooting:

1. Make sure you have downloaded and installed all of the apachi files listed on the main page on required files.

2. Be sure my files are installed properly, mesh and texture folders should be merged with the same ones in the skyrim/data folder. Make sure my .esp file is also pasted in your data folder. If you used nexus mod manager this should be done right.

3. Make sure your load order is correct in mod manager or data files. Apachi .esm should be at the top with other .esm files (but below skyrim, update, etc)(The same is true for all .esm files). The .esp should be below. My .esp file should be below Apachi\'s.

4. It is possible that apachiskyhair might be conflicting with another mod. You can check on Apachi\'s nexus page to see if there is a list of mods that they know cause conflicts. My mod in particular needs apachi\'s files in order for it to work, without apchiskyhair\'s a ctd will happen. My file is a companion mod, so it won\'t cause a conflict as it is all added content, not altering in-game content.

5. If all of the above did not work, then you must have a conflict somewhere.


________________________________________________________________________________________

Special Thanks:

Apachi in particular for the awesome hair mod! You are an inspiration to modders.
The creators and re-creators of Tactics Ogre (Square-Enix)
All modders whose mods I have linked to, your work has greatly enhanced Skyrim.
Bethesda for Skyrim, thank you for the beautiful game!
author: Scorpiovaeden
